Title: The mighty current of communism will vigorously scatter all insensate rocks!
Designer: Central Academy of Industrial Art and Design (中央工艺美术学院)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The rocks that are scattered by the socialist revolution (社会主义革命) carry designations like localism (地方主义), individualism (个人主义) and other obstructions to the Great Leap Forward.
